BiquadFilterNodeQ.summary: The Q property of the interface is an a-rate , a double representing a Q factor, or quality factor.

remarks.para: It is a dimensionless value with a default value of 1 and a nominal range of 0.0001 to 1000.

BiquadFilterNodeQ.value:
An .
NOTENote: Though the AudioParam returned is read-only, the value it represents is not.
